description:
YesWeHack has raised more than $52 million to date to build and market a crowdsourced vulnerability reporting platform.

title: French Bug Bounty Platform YesWeHack Raises $28 Million

description:

title: Pyte Raises $5 Million for Secure Data Collaboration Solutions

description:

description:
